title: Parables of Jesus
description: This quiz explores key teachings of Jesus through His parables, focusing on spiritual lessons and moral truths. Each question challenges users to reflect on the meanings behind stories like the Parable of the Sower, the Prodigal Son, and the Good Samaritan, promoting deeper biblical understanding in an engaging format.
